reviewText: SUPERMAN!  no wait its a small Superman, oh it's SUPERBOY!8 Classic Action packed episodes:1.The Revolt of Robotville - Robots directing traffic is one thing but when Robots start operating tanks, things get scary!2.The Great Kryptonite Caper - Lana has a nice necklace, but its made of Kryptonite!  For some reason, Clark doesent like it.3.Krypto's Calamitous Capers - Whats with Krypto the superdog lately that makes him want to suddenly attack Superboy? Maybe its the beam that the Mad professor created to make him do just that, or not.4.Double Trouble, Double Doom - Evil, bald astronauts attempt to take over a solid gold planet.  Thats all I have here.5.Superboy meets Mighty Lad - There's a new superhero on the block who is trying to steal Superboy's glory, but he actually isnt all that super and has other intentions opposite of the ones a nice person might have!6.The Black Knight - Superboy goes back in time to rescue this little kid who he knows and ends up being challenged to a duel by the Black Knight of King Arthur's Court! Merlin, the wizard shows up, but Superboy is a lot cooler than he is!7.Krypto: Super Seeing Eye Dog - Krypto accidentally blinds Superboy so its up to the Superdog to lead him home.  Superboy regains his vision when a bomb blows up in his face, but Krypto still feels bad, which he should.8.The Jinxed Circus - Freaky things start occurring at a circus that has recently come to Smallville and Superboy realizes its not because of the freaks that work there but because of the freaks that used to work there!
summary: Its a bird, Its a plane, Its...
Title: N/A

reviewText: In this video, you get what you see. If you want to watch some of the old episodes of Superboy from the 1960s cartoons that were televised along with The New Adventures of Superman, this will be for you. If you are not interested in old television animation, you will want to pass this one up. Personally, I enjoy watching stories of Superman from any era. I know the stories can be very childish and corny, particularly when you add Krypto the super-pup, but it is all done in fun and it is part of the Superman mythos. I only wish more of these stories were available. I recommend this to anyone who enjoys the nastalgia of 60s Superman stories.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This will be brief. I love this video. I collect everything Superman. This Superboy cartoon collection is pretty good. With legal considerations between Warner Brothers and the creators of the Superboy character tying up any foreseeable DVD release of anything with the name Superboy on it, this will probably be the only way to see these cartoons. I hate cheap bootlegs and won't buy them. I recommend this VHS to anyone actively collecting Superman/Superboy items. I have all the Super Powers Collection VHS tapes and they're all pretty good. Try Amazon or eBay to find them all.

reviewText: This, as well as all the other Super Collection videos,is Great! I love animation from the 1960's ! It is absolutely fabulous!  Now lets get those old late '60's Spidermans on video also, boys!! Dig a bit deeper into that vault!

reviewText: There are a lot of half-hour superhero 'toon shows these days, as well as a lot of direct-to-disc features, but what they don't make anymore are the short featurettes (5 - 10 min). I really love the old shorts and this is a hard one to find. Glad I got it.
